note: Preview query for demand match cards. Called after GetMatchesByConsultantId (Query 5). MatchingScore/PricePerformanceScore/TotalMatchingRequirements are placeholders (filled by app from Query 5).

fieldDescriptions.DemandId: Demand.Id - the matched demand's unique identifier
fieldDescriptions.IsPinned: 1 if consultant is already assigned to this demand (via DemandConsultants), 0 otherwise
fieldDescriptions.MatchingScore: Placeholder (0). Actual value comes from Query 5 (GetMatchesByConsultantId)
fieldDescriptions.PricePerformanceScore: Placeholder (0). Actual value comes from Query 5
fieldDescriptions.DemandName: Demand name resolved via NameLocaleKeyId → LocaleDict for @SystemLanguage
fieldDescriptions.ClientCompanyName: Client company name via Demand → Opportunity → Company → Name
fieldDescriptions.LogoUrl: Client company logo URL from Company.LogoUrl (nullable)
fieldDescriptions.TotalMatchingRequirements: Placeholder (0). Actual value comes from Query 5
fieldDescriptions.TopMatchesJson: JSON array of top 2-3 matched requirements (excludes Role/CustomRole), sorted by partial_score contribution. Structure: [{RequirementId, RequirementName, ConsultantScore}]
fieldDescriptions.TopMatches: NULL placeholder for OutSystems structure definition (deserialized TopMatchesJson)
